data.name: Radii
data.detailed_description:
Radii is a challenging platformer, one that defies what it means to be a platformer.

Explore an abandoned compound as a sphere implanted with a synthesized conscience.
No one knows why it's here, or what it is...

Capable only of leaping in any direction, one must maintain momentum while maintaining energy, which is used by any action.
Collect new abilities and use them in new areas, discovering secrets and unlocking your way out.
data.about_the_game:
Radii is a challenging platformer, one that defies what it means to be a platformer.

Explore an abandoned compound as a sphere implanted with a synthesized conscience.
No one knows why it's here, or what it is...

Capable only of leaping in any direction, one must maintain momentum while maintaining energy, which is used by any action.
Collect new abilities and use them in new areas, discovering secrets and unlocking your way out.
data.short_description: Radii is a challenging platformer. Traverse an abandoned compound with limited movement capabilities, managing energy and momentum.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4590
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: macOS 10.9
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo

  • Storage: 300 MB available space

  • Storage: 300 MB available space
